title: Windows 10 Course (2020 Edition)
headline: Learn all about Windows 10, the latest operating system from Microsoft
description: This free online course will be particularly useful for windows beginners and professionals who have a keen interest in windows 10. The course captures the essential features of windows 10 in a detailed form. By the end of this course, learners will be able to comfortably use recent and feature-packed versions of Microsoftâ€™s windows operating system, especially the updated 2020 version of the Windows 10 operating system.
courseDescription:
The course begins by introducing you to windows 10, explaining the general content of the course, including its usefulness for beginners and people who are familiar with earlier versions of windows. You will be introduced to simple ways of identifying the windows version running on your personal computer. You will learn about the system requirements for running windows 10. You will also learn how to acquire windows 10 on your computer.    

The course then takes you through the windows 10 desktop and start menu. You will learn about options for working in tablet mode in windows 10, and options for working in multiple different windows. You will learn how to run windows and desktop programs. You will also learn about the differences between applications and desktop programs in a windows environment. 

The course then explains the structure and organization of the storage in a windows environment. You will learn how to use tools to access what is stored on the computer. You will learn about the file explorer ribbon and how to navigate files and folders. You will also learn about the different types of accounts in windows 10.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard.
